content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Ah, Mary Smith. I'm glad you could make it. So, what's your budget for a 25 square meter apartment in this fine city?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 400 Euros per month. I would like to negotiate with you to get the best possible price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
Well, I can certainly understand why you'd want to get the best possible price. But let me tell you something, 400 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment in this city is quite low. I'm afraid I can't accept that offer.

But don't worry, I'm sure we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. How about we start with 500 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm willing to accept 500 Euros per month.

I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I'm sure you'll find your new home to be quite comfortable and enjoyable. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
